document_data.name: Plate of Silver
document_data.mainbody: '''Plate of Silver''' was a dish served at the [[Stargath House]] inn in the [[Amn]]ian town of [[Purskul]].
document_data.Description:
The dish contained grilled until soft [[silverfin]] [[fish]] dabbed with a sauce mix of [[raspberry]] juice and [[vinegar]]. The fish was served on a mountain of cooked [[crab]], [[onion]]s, and fried sliced [[potato]]es.

This platter went well together with grilled [[calf's liver]] braised in [[zzar]], [[mintjuice mash]], and [[lemon]], or [[mussel]]s in [[spice|spicy]] [[vegetable broth]].
